title: Beachfront Koh Si Chang Island Oasis with Guaranteed Ocean Views, Onsite Restaurant, Spa & Pool
description:
Experience the tropical tranquillity of Thailand at this beachfront hotel. Located on the serene island of Koh Si Chang, this secluded haven is the perfect base for exploring the island's lush landscapes, hidden caves and historic temples.

Dine on authentic Thai cuisine at the hotel's restaurant, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or relax and rejuvenate by booking a treatment at the spa. Venture out to explore the vibrant local markets or take a leisurely stroll along the island's picturesque coastline.
offer_address: 333 Tha Thewawong, Ko Si Chang, Chonburi 20120, Thailand
